### Features

- ☑️ Built with a modern tech stack with Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind.css, React, Motion.
- ☑️ Minimal design with a focus on user experience.
- ☑️ Reveal and scroll triggered animations.
- ☑️ With optimized animation performance, desabling scroll triggered animations on mobile for a better user experience.
- ☑️ Easy to customize and extend and change the content or the design.
- ☑️ Smooth scrolling.
- ☑️ Deployed on Vercel.

### Dependencies

- Next.js 15
- Next.js 15
- Typescript 5
- Tailwind.css v4
- React 19
- Motion
- Lenis

### Sections

- Menu
- Hero
- About
- Achievements
